attributes.action: Say No ! to British military serving in any future European Army.
attributes.additional_details:
Angela Merkel and President macron, have said that there is a need for a future European Army. The real possibility is that after Britain leaves the European union, Great Britain will still be tied into many European laws and regulations.
Therefore it cannot be ruled out, that the European Union will not in the future, attempts to make laws, that over rules parliament  and requires either British military personnel or civilians to serve or be conscripted into a Future European Army.
attributes.background: Angela Merkel and  President macron  say that there is a need for a future European Army.  The real possibility is that after Britain technically leaves the European Union,Great Britain will still be tied into many of the European laws and regulations, a European Army could be one of them.
